He arrives there, and sees that the family truck is gone, so he looks on the kitchen to see if there is a note, he checks and finds one.

Dear clark,

Something has come up, we had to go to Metropolis on an important errand, we may not be back all weekend, maybe even longer. We hope we can trust you to stay home alone and we will be back shortly.

Love, The Kents.

He thinks to himself, sweet. Then he remembers lana, pete, and the rest of the gang are on a trip, he says oh well i will have a peaceful weekend for once, He pulls out the purple kryptonite rock, he looks at it for awhile and yawns sleepily. His friends mysteriouly shrink at his house when exposed to purple kryptonite, his parents are gone for the week and his friends are thought to be on a trip, what will happen?
